verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His name is Wonderful, His name is Wonderful, His name is Wonderful, Jesus, my Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He is the Mighty King, Master of everything, His name is Wonderful, Jesus, my Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Heâ€™s the Great Shepherd, The Rock of All Ages, Almighty God is He.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We bow down before Him, Love and adore Him, His name is Wonderful, Jesus, my Lord.{/lang-eng}
